description: GemBox.Document is a .NET component that enables developers to read, write, convert and print document files (DOCX, DOC, PDF, HTML, XPS, RTF, TXT) from .NET applications in a simple and efficient way.
releaseNotes:
- Fixed various issues with RTF reader.
- Added support for 'default tab stop' in API, DOCX and PDF.
- Fixed issues with paragraph font size and automatic tab stops in PDF.
- Fixed issue with 'keep lines together' in PDF.
- Fixed issue with writing 'auto' color to DrawingML and VML.
- Added support for updating TOC numeric fields and other document's numeric fields (Page, PageRef, NumPages, Section and SectionPages) while paginating the document by specifying PaginatorOptions.UpdateFields member.
- Pages without specified page color are left transparent if output format supports transparency, otherwise they are filled with white color.
- Added support for line number count by in DOCX and PDF.
summary: GemBox.Document is a .NET component for reading and writing Word (DOCX, DOC), PDF, XPS, HTML and RTF documents.
